query: SELECT id, subdomain, slug, name, config FROM publishedLandings WHERE slug LIKE '%prueba%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 34PJYedpVygExjM.e1ecfc4d4172 --database ZbHp7JpkjVz6yScGwQHTeE --execute SELECT id, subdomain, slug, name, config FROM publishedLandings WHERE slug LIKE '%prueba%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;

Much better than trying to figure out the government website myself."}], "title": "What Travelers Say"}, "id": "testimonials-1", "styles": {"backgroundColor": "#1a1a2e", "textColor": "#ffffff"}, "type": "testimonials"}, {"content": {"items": [{"answer": "Yes, as of 2024, all visitors to Thailand must complete a digital arrival card before arrival. This replaces the traditional paper forms filled out on the plane.", "question": "Do I really need a digital arrival card for Thailand?"}, {"answer": "Most applications are processed within 5-15 minutes. In peak times, it may take up to 1 hour. We recommend applying at least 24 hours before your flight.", "question": "How long does the application process take?"}, {"answer": "Yes, we are an authorized partner of the Thai Immigration Bureau. Your digital arrival card will be officially recognized by Thai immigration officers.", "question": "Is this service official and legitimate?"}, {"answer": "Application rejections are rare if all information is correct. If rejected, we provide full support to fix any issues and resubmit at no additional cost.", "question": "What if my application is rejected?"}, {"answer": "Yes, you can submit multiple applications for family members traveling together. Each person needs their own digital arrival card.", "question": "Can I apply for my family members?"}, {"answer": "No printing required. The digital card is stored electronically and linked to your passport. Immigration officers can access it with your passport number.", "question": "Do I need to print the digital arrival card?"}], "subtitle": "Everything you need to know about Thailand Digital Arrival Card", "title": "Frequently Asked Questions"}, "id": "faq-1", "styles": {"backgroundColor": "#ffffff", "textColor": "#1a1a1a"}, "type": "faq"}, {"content": {"ctaLink": "#form", "ctaText": "Start Your Application", "subtitle": "Complete your Thailand Digital Arrival Card application now and travel with confidence", "title": "Ready to Apply?"}, "id": "cta-1", "styles": {"backgroundColor": "#f59e0b", "buttonColor": "#1a1a2e", "textColor": "#1a1a1a"}, "type": "cta"}, {"content": {"fields": [{"label": "Full Name (as on passport)", "name": "fullName", "placeholder": "Enter your full name", "required": true, "type": "text"}, {"label": "Email Address", "name": "email", "placeholder": "your@email.com", "required": true, "type": "email"}, {"label": "Phone Number", "name": "phone", "placeholder": "+1 (555) 123-4567", "required": true, "type": "tel"}, {"label": "Nationality", "name": "nationality", "placeholder": "e.g., American, British, etc.", "required": true, "type": "text"}, {"label": "Passport Number", "name": "passportNumber", "placeholder": "Enter passport number", "required": true, "type": "text"}, {"label": "Arrival Date in Thailand", "name": "arrivalDate", "required": true, "type": "date"}, {"label": "Flight Number", "name": "flightNumber", "placeholder": "e.g., TG101", "required": true, "type": "text"}, {"label": "Accommodation Address in Thailand", "name": "accommodation", "placeholder": "Hotel name and address", "required": true, "type": "textarea"}], "submitText": "Submit Application", "subtitle": "Complete the form below to begin your application process", "successMessage": "Application submitted successfully! You'll receive confirmation within 15 minutes.", "title": "Thailand Digital Arrival Card Application"}, "id": "form-1", "styles": {"backgroundColor": "#1a1a2e", "buttonColor": "#f59e0b", "textColor": "#ffffff"}, "type": "form"}, {"content": {"columns": [{"links": [{"href": "#form", "label": "Apply Now"}, {"href": "#status", "label": "Check Status"}, {"href": "#requirements", "label": "Requirements"}, {"href": "#process", "label": "Process"}], "title": "Service"}, {"links": [{"href": "#faq", "label": "FAQ"}, {"href": "#contact", "label": "Contact Us"}, {"href": "#chat", "label": "Live Chat"}, {"href": "#help", "label": "Help Center"}], "title": "Support"}, {"links": [{"href": "#privacy", "label": "Privacy Policy"}, {"href": "#terms", "label": "Terms of Service"}, {"href": "#refund", "label": "Refund Policy"}, {"href": "#disclaimer", "label": "Disclaimer"}], "title": "Legal"}], "copyright": "© 2024 Thailand Digital Arrival Card.
